msbt.message: What's up, ?
Hey, !
Dear ,
To the awesome ,
Love the present! You keep being so nice, it's gonna rub off on me!
What an awesome surprise! You've got a gift for this gift-giving thing.
Just got your gift! You put some serious thought into that! Thanks!
Your present rocks! Oh! No need to worry, it got here in one piece.
That was super awesome to send a gift with your card! Mega wow!
It doesn't feel right if you keep getting me stuff, so I'm gonna turn the tables on ya!
Think you're the gift-giving master? Well two can play at this game! And don't you DARE send this back!
It feels like I gotta thank you somehow, so I went and grabbed a little something for you.
I've actually been sitting on something for you for a bit. Thanks for reminding me to send it!
I went out and got you something. It comes highly recommended by me, so you KNOW it's good. Ha!
Bet you're gonna love it!
Tell me what you think of it, OK?
Hope you like it!
Don't like it? Pass it on!
Yeah, I totally did that.
Keep rockin'! –
From
The amazing
Talk to you later. –
